channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- tagDiv Cloud Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- tagDiv Cloud Library

item.title: CVE-2023-1597|2023-07-10T13:05:46.120Z -- unknown -- tagdiv%20cloud%20library
item.description: The tagDiv Cloud Library WordPress plugin before 2.7 does not have authorisation and CSRF in an AJAX action accessible to both unauthenticated and authenticated users, allowing unauthenticated users to change arbitrary user metadata, which could lead to privilege escalation by setting themselves as an admin of the blog.
